Title: Battlemage
Legend: Masters of the arcane arts, the grizzled Battlemages of the Collegiate Arcane summon lethal storms of magic to lay waste to their foes and shield their comrades from harm with protective enchantments.
Intro: A Battlemage is armed with a Wizard’s Staff.

Rules.Name: Wizard
Rules.Rule: WIZARD: This unit can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase.
